channel.title: Interest In Infosec
channel.description: Recent content on Interest In Infosec

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the first post on the blog. I’ve decided on using gohugo.io and S3 bucket to host as a static page. I’ve used the guide from Sithum Jayarathna https://medium.com/avmconsulting-blog/automate-static-website-deployment-from-github-to-s3-using-aws-codepipeline-16acca25ebc1 Test12 Test 23 (https://google.com) www.google.com “google.com” ref=url.com what the hell

item.title: About Me
item.description: This is a test About-me page. This blog will cover the bits of information that I uncover relating to: Infosec News Configurations Financial Tools Occasional Cats & Camping https://Mainesec.Org At no point should anything contained within be taken as gospel, or even a good idea. Copy/paste at your own risk!
